text: Piruana is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Piruana. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Piruana pulchra Martins, Galileo & de Oliveira, 2009 * Piruana tuberosa Galileo & Martins, 1998 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Piruana
